getting_there: Go through customs. Take either escalator to bottom floor. We are next door to the duty free shop.  Our mobile numbers are 07584680834 and 07880008361. Or call the kitchen on 02082836232.

location.address: Unit 8 Gate Level, Terminal 5, Heathrow Airport, Hounslow TW6 2GA

title: Heathrow, Terminal 5
